title: Word for Word
description: A Python interactive quote-guessing web app created and deployed using Streamlit, web scraping, and an external SQL database.

title: Weatherly
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: Read the Room
description: A Python program to obtain and analyze various trends in data related to eBooks, using Natural Language Processing and Regex.

title: Dungeon Escape
description: A C++ terminal-based game that descriptively takes the user on a dungeon adventure full of dangers and challenges.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: Healthy Habit Helper
description: A C++ terminal-based program to keep track of habits to maintain and encourage a healthy lifestyle.

title: To-Do List
description: A Python web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks.
